uk.co.saiman.experiment

Interface ExperimentExecutionContext<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the executing node

    public interface ExperimentExecutionContext<T>
    The context of an experiment execution, providing information about the current state, and enabling modification of that state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <U> ExperimentResult<U> getResult(ExperimentResultType<U> resultType) 
      ExperimentNode<?,T> node() 
      <U> ExperimentResult<U> setResult(ExperimentResultType<U> resultType, U resultData)
      This method provides a target for the submission of results during execution of an experiment node.

    • Method Detail

      • node

        ExperimentNode<?,T> node()
        Returns:
        the currently executing experiment node

      • getResult

        <U> ExperimentResult<U> getResult(ExperimentResultType<U> resultType)
        Parameters:
        resultType - the type of result
        Returns:
        the result object now registered to the executing node

      • setResult

                                  U resultData)
        This method provides a target for the submission of results during execution of an experiment node.
        Parameters:

        resultData - the result
